name: places/ChIJE029KvVYwokREVcTy0j4goA
formattedAddress: 60 W 68th St #1A, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 60 W 68th St #1A, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: I can't express my gratitude and appreciation enough for Dr. Aaron. I wasn't a patient of hers, but needed a surgical procedure to continue fertility treatments. I received a next-day appointment, and was met with kindness and understanding, but also honesty and factual information. Somehow, by some miracle, she was able to get me into the OR within DAYS, successfully perform the procedure, and have me back on my journey without missing a beat. Her staff was able to answer all of my questions and give me clear instructions every step of the way. I would recommend her to anyone.

text.text: I can't express my gratitude and appreciation enough for Dr. Aaron. I wasn't a patient of hers, but needed a surgical procedure to continue fertility treatments. I received a next-day appointment, and was met with kindness and understanding, but also honesty and factual information. Somehow, by some miracle, she was able to get me into the OR within DAYS, successfully perform the procedure, and have me back on my journey without missing a beat. Her staff was able to answer all of my questions and give me clear instructions every step of the way. I would recommend her to anyone.

originalText.text:
From the first ultrasound when Dr. Aaron told us that we were having twins, until she delivered them, Dr. Aaron was nothing but professional, calm and kind. During my pregnancy she always answered all of our questions and concerns. She always called me back in a timely manner. When I needed to go to the hospital once during the pregnancy, she called me multiple times to check in on me until I was released home.
Her staff is very nice, and the appointments are always on time.
I highly recommend her.

originalText.text: Dr. Aaron is an excellent clinican, she is direct and to the point during visits. No time wasting or idle chitchat . Her front desk staff is efficient and easy to communicate with. Dr. Aaron is also a top notch surgeon. This doctor will not ask more than the needed/necessary  questions if you need/want a procedure completed. She will take the time to answer any/all patient questions. Overall an excellent experience.

text.text: Dr. Aaron is an excellent clinican, she is direct and to the point during visits. No time wasting or idle chitchat . Her front desk staff is efficient and easy to communicate with. Dr. Aaron is also a top notch surgeon. This doctor will not ask more than the needed/necessary  questions if you need/want a procedure completed. She will take the time to answer any/all patient questions. Overall an excellent experience.

originalText.text: Dr Aaron was my doctor for both my pregnancies and I’m happily the mother of two beautiful babies. She took time to answer all my questions at the appointments and understood my risk factors to make sure I and the baby remained healthy. It was easy to get ultrasounds done in her office without having to go to the hospital. Her office staff is also professional and friendly. I recommend her to friends looking for an OBGYN.

originalText.text:
All thanks to Dr. Aaron's  care and suggestions. I became a mother of 3 healthy children after 40.
Dr. Aaron really listens to me and always provides the best option.
She is efficient, considerate and truly kind. I am absolutely lucky one, she takes care of my health. I can't thank you enough to Dr. Aaron.
